video.title: The Great British Baking Show
video.synopsis: A talented batch of amateur bakers face off in a 10-week competition, whipping up their best dishes in the hopes of being named the U.K.'s best.

episodes.synopsis: Twelve amateur bakers begin the competition with the challenge of creating a Swiss roll, Mary Berry's classic cherry cake and miniature British cakes.
episodes.title: Cake

episodes.synopsis: The eleven remaining bakers must create biscuits to complement a cheese course, make Mary's Florentines and design a three-dimensional "showstopper."
episodes.title: Biscuits

episodes.synopsis: In the contest's third week, the remaining bakers must produce perfect rye rolls, follow Paul's ciabatta recipe and make a filled centerpiece loaf.
episodes.title: Bread

episodes.synopsis: The competition continues with a "saucy puds" bake-off, a tiramisu technical challenge and a heated Showstopper round featuring baked Alaska.
episodes.title: Desserts

episodes.synopsis: The remaining bakers try to conquer custard tarts, mini pear pies and the Showstopper's tall challenge: Create three-tiered pies in only four hours.
episodes.title: Pies and Tarts

episodes.synopsis: The six remaining bakers have two hours to bake a 24-step Swedish Princess torte and must make a modern version of a Hungarian Dobos torte.
episodes.title: Continental Cake

episodes.synopsis: From pasties to samosas, this week's baking battles includes both savory and sweet, plus an elusive multilayered pastry puzzle known as kouign amann.
episodes.title: Pastries

episodes.synopsis: The five remaining bakers show off their sweet skills in the quarterfinals with fruit loaves, three dozen doughnuts and a tasty technical challenge.
episodes.title: Advanced Dough

episodes.synopsis: The heat is on during the semifinals when the bakers must create baklava, a 20-layer German schichttorte and entremet, a complex mousse-based cake.
episodes.title: Patisserie

episodes.synopsis: A trophy awaits the finalist who masters a classic technique that typically takes days, and can deliver several perfect pastries -- with no recipe.
episodes.title: The Final
